snippet: A new preserve in a mountainous region of western Colombia is intended to help protect the golden poison frog, whose skin is covered by a secretion of deadly alkaloid poison that can kill humans within minutes.
abstract: A new preserve in a mountainous region of western Colombia is intended to help protect the golden poison frog, whose skin is covered by a secretion of deadly alkaloid poison that can kill humans within minutes.

headline.main: Protecting Killer Frogs From Killer Humans
